name: Halloween Games for Toddlers and Babies
summary:
This is a funny Halloween educational game for children. Hold the diapers ready.
The game features different kind of learning peg puzzles, where kids can learn about shapes, form, sizes, colors and they can collect stars to unlock an additional find the pairs memo game, where they can play against a virtual animal cat opponent. All games feature safe for children exclusive funny Halloween illustrations, animations and sounds.
